metadata.title: CVE-2019-13290 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Artifex MuPDF 1.15.0 has a heap-based buffer overflow infz_append_display_node located at fitz/list-device.c, allowing remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF file. This occurswith a large BDC property name that overflows the allocated size of adisplay list node.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
